responses.yield: To increase crop yield, focus on soil health, proper fertilization, optimal planting density, and regular monitoring for pests and diseases.
responses.irrigation: Drip irrigation is highly efficient for water conservation. Water early morning or evening to reduce evaporation.
responses.weather: Weather significantly impacts crop growth. Monitor temperature, rainfall, and humidity. Use weather forecasts for planning irrigation and harvesting.
responses.fertilizer: Apply fertilizer based on soil test results. Generally, apply nitrogen during active growth periods and phosphorus during root development.
